00025 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_WIN32
00026 #   include <windows.h>
00027 #   include <wingdi.h>

00029 
00030 #include "OgreSDLTexture.h"
00031 #include "OgreTextureManager.h"
00032 #include "OgreDataChunk.h"
00033 #include "OgreImage.h"
00034 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre {
00037 
00038     SDLTexture::SDLTexture(String name)
00039     {
00040         mName = name;
00041         enable32Bit(false);
00042     }
00043 
00044     SDLTexture::~SDLTexture()
00045     {
00046         unload();
00047     }
00048 
00049     void SDLTexture::blitToTexture( 
00050         const Image& src, 
00051         unsigned uStartX, unsigned uStartY )
00052     {
00053         Image img = src;
00054         img.flipAroundX();
00055 
00056         glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTextureID );
00057         applyGamma( 
00058             img.getData(), img.getSize(), 
00059             img.getFormat() & Image::FMT_ALPHA ? 32 : 24 );
00060         glTexSubImage2D( 
00061             GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, 
00062             uStartX, uStartY,
00063             img.getWidth(), img.getHeight(),
00064             img.getFormat() & Image::FMT_ALPHA ? GL_RGBA : GL_RGB, 
00065             GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, img.getData() );
00066     }
00067 
00068     void SDLTexture::loadImage( const Image &src )
00069     {
00070         Image img = src;
00071         img.flipAroundX();
00072 
00073         if( mIsLoaded )
00074         {
00075             unload();
00076         }
00077 
00078         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage( 
00079             LML_NORMAL,
00080             "SDLTexture: Loading %s with %d mipmaps from Image.", 
00081             mName.c_str(), mNumMipMaps );        
00082 
00083         if( img.getFormat() & Image::FMT_ALPHA )
00084         {
00085             mSrcBpp = 32;
00086             mHasAlpha = true;
00087         }
00088         else
00089         {
00090             mSrcBpp = 24;
00091             mHasAlpha = false;
00092         }
00093 
00094         mSrcWidth = img.getWidth();
00095         mSrcHeight = img.getHeight();
00096 
00097         uchar *pTempData = new uchar[ img.getSize() ];
00098         memcpy( pTempData, img.getConstData(), img.getSize() );
00099 
00100         // Create the GL texture
00101         glGenTextures( 1, &mTextureID );
00102         glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTextureID );
00103         applyGamma( pTempData, img.getSize(), mSrcBpp );
00104         glTexImage2D(
00105             GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, mHasAlpha ? GL_RGBA : GL_RGB, 
00106             img.getWidth(), img.getHeight(), 0, 
00107             mHasAlpha ? GL_RGBA : GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pTempData );
00108         generateMipMaps( pTempData );
00109 
00110         delete [] pTempData;
00111 
00112         // Update size (the final size, not including temp space)
00113         short bytesPerPixel = mFinalBpp >> 3;
00114         if( !mHasAlpha && mFinalBpp == 32 )
00115         {
00116             bytesPerPixel--;
00117         }
00118         mSize = mWidth * mHeight * bytesPerPixel;
00119 
00120         mIsLoaded = true;     
00121     }
00122     
00123     void SDLTexture::load()
00124     {        
00125         Image img;
00126         img.load( mName );
00127 
00128         loadImage( img );
00129     }
00130     
00131     void SDLTexture::unload()
00132     {
00133         if( mIsLoaded )
00134         {
00135             glDeleteTextures( 1, &mTextureID );
00136             mIsLoaded = false;
00137         }
00138     }
00139     
00140     void SDLTexture::generateMipMaps( uchar *data )
00141     {
00142         glTexParameteri( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAX_LEVEL, mNumMipMaps );
00143         gluBuild2DMipmaps(
00144             GL_TEXTURE_2D, mHasAlpha ? GL_RGBA : GL_RGB, mSrcWidth, mSrcHeight, 
00145             mHasAlpha ? GL_RGBA : GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, data );
00146     }
00147 }
